title: mystery gift not working?
body:
Me and my friend are trying to gift eachother but the mystery gift does not work, they say that we do not cover the requirements needed which we obviously do. (its just skins that we cant gift)

any way to fix this?

replies.body:
I can only suggest that you don't meet the requirements for gifting to that friend then.
Remember it could be something on your end or his. 
For example if he doesn't have a minimum of 10 available skins for the champs he owns that meet requirements you wont be able to gift him.

If you are unsure, I would suggest sending a support ticket and have them investigate it.
have you been friends for long enough
yes ive been friends for over a year

Hey Guys,
Are you still experiencing this issue?

I have been testing this all morning and it has worked every time. I have managed to gift 4 skins.
I'm still having this issue now
Im having the same issue cant gift 2 of my friends and meet all of the requirements and so do they
